item.title: Spicks and Specks
item.description: Where is the sun That shone on my head The sun in my life It is dead It is dead Where is the light That would play In my streets And where are the friends I could meet I could meet Where are the girls I left far behind The spicks and the specks Of the girls on my mind Where is the sun That shone on my head

item.title: 假如生活欺骗了你
item.description: 假如生活欺骗了你， 不要悲伤，不要心急！ 忧郁的日子里，必须镇静： 相信吧，快乐的日子终将会来临。 心儿永远向着未来； 现在却常是忧郁。 一切都是瞬息，一切都将会过去； 而那过去了的，就会成为亲切的怀恋。
